name: ArXivChatGuru (redis-developer)
description: [项目级] Use ArXiv ChatGuru to talk to research papers. This app uses LangChain, OpenAI, Streamlit, and Redis as a vector database/semantic cache.。来源: https://github.com/redis-developer/ArXivChatGuru

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Use ArXiv ChatGuru to talk to research papers. This app uses LangChain, OpenAI, Streamlit, and Redis as a vector database/semantic cache.

来源: https://github.com/redis-developer/ArXivChatGuru
语言: Python
Stars: 553
